Package noppes.npcs.api.handler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IActionManager
    Manages a queue of IAction instances, allowing scheduling of delayed, repeating, or conditional "tasks" for NPC scripting.
    IAnimationHandler  
    IAttributeHandler
    Handles registration and lookup of attribute definitions as well as retrieval of player attributes.
    ICloneHandler  
    ICustomEffectHandler
    Handler interface for managing custom effects.
    IDialogHandler  
    IFactionHandler  
    IMagicHandler
    Provides methods to access and modify magic and magic cycles.
    INaturalSpawnsHandler  
    IOverlayHandler  
    IPartyHandler  
    IPlayerBankData  
    IPlayerData  
    IPlayerDialogData  
    IPlayerFactionData  
    IPlayerItemGiverData  
    IPlayerMailData  
    IPlayerQuestData  
    IPlayerTransportData  
    IProfileHandler  
    IQuestHandler  
    IRecipeHandler  
    ITagHandler  
    ITransportHandler
